name: cp-tools
description: Competitive Programming Tools for VS Code

cph.general.saveLocation.description: Location where generated .tcs and .bin files will be saved. Leave empty to save the file in the source file directory. Use this to clean up your folders.

cph.general.timeOut.description: The time in ms for which a testcase is run before it is killed ( timed-out ).

cph.general.hideStderrorWhenCompiledOK.description: Ignore and don't show stderror when compilation exit code is zero.

cph.general.ignoreSTDERROR.description: If enabled, non-empty standard error will not result in testcase failing.

cph.language.c.Args.title: Compilation flags for .c files
cph.language.c.Args.description: Space seperated additional flags passed to gcc ( for C ) while compiling your file. Example '-O2 -Wall'

cph.language.c.Command.description: Command used to compile .c files. Example 'gcc', 'gcc-10', 'clang', etc.

cph.language.cpp.Args.title: Compilation flags for .cpp files
cph.language.cpp.Args.description: Space seperated additional flags passed to g++ ( for C++ ) while compiling your file. Example '-D_GLIBCXX_DEBUG -std=c++20'

cph.language.cpp.Command.description: Command used to compile .cpp files. Example 'g++', 'g++-10', 'clang++', etc.

cph.language.python.Args.title: Compilation flags for Python
cph.language.python.Args.description: Space seperated additional flags passed to python while compiling your file. Example '-Wignore -u'

cph.language.python.Command.description: Command used to run python files. Example 'py', 'python3', 'pypy3', etc.

cph.language.java.Args.title: Compilation flags for Java
cph.language.java.Args.description: Space seperated additional flags passed to javac while compiling your file. Example '-verbose'

cph.language.java.Command.description: Command used to compile java files.

cph.language.rust.Args.title: Compilation flags for Rust
cph.language.rust.Args.description: Space seperated additional flags passed to rustc while compiling your file. Example '-O2 --verbose'

cph.language.rust.Command.description: Command used to compile rust files.

cph.language.go.Args.title: Compilation flags for .go files
cph.language.go.Args.description: Space seperated additional flags passed to go while compiling your file. Example '-gcflags=-S'

cph.general.retainWebviewContext.description: Keep the webview active even when it's hidden. May improve performance but may cause some rendering issues.

cph.general.autoShowJudge.description: Automatically show the judge view when opening a file that has a problem associated with it

scripts.vscode:prepublish: npm run webpack-frontend-production && npm run webpack-production
